[00:07.990]Mile mile  mile mile pe maidan
[00:10.530]Pentru tine  tine sa-ti dau un dar  dar

name: 作曲家
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : 李荣浩
[00:01.00] 作词 : 李荣浩
[00:06.090]
[00:09.730]又很久没见你剪了长发
[00:13.774]谈怎么说话谈怎么启发
[00:18.598]怕歌词写的肉麻怕浮夸
[00:27.687]放一盘磁带七八十年代
[00:32.156]才听了一半就悲伤起来
[00:36.878]每一句里的感慨都是现在
[00:44.048]作曲家写一首我们一生最平凡的歌
[00:53.630]作曲家告诉你爱的人你多真多深刻
[01:02.623]作曲家我还是你多年未见的老友啊
[01:12.375]而你还是不太明白孤独是个节拍
[01:26.983]音符不会写写歌是感觉
[01:31.554]看几眼世界多几个头衔
[01:35.730]理论书上的观点有缺陷
[01:45.510]颁一个奖牌说一段对白
[01:49.292]不谈情说爱也尽量精彩
[01:53.964]没几个人生下来不是天才
[02:02.337]作曲家写一首我们一生最平凡的歌
[02:11.173]作曲家告诉你爱的人你多真多深刻
[02:20.313]作曲家我还是你多年未见的老友啊
[02:30.063]而你还是不太明白孤独是个节拍
[02:52.946]作曲家写一首我们一生最平凡的歌
[03:01.577]作曲家告诉你爱的人你多真多深刻
[03:10.617]作曲家我还是你多年未见的老友啊
[03:20.271]而你还是不太明白孤独是个节拍
[03:27.730]
[03:30.784]
[03:34.135]

name: Despacito(Remix)
lyric:
[by:Winson1984]
[00:09.690]Come on over in my direction
[00:12.153]So thankful for that, it's such a blessin', yeah
[00:15.049]Turn every situation into Heaven, yeah
[00:17.977]Oh, you are
[00:20.531]My sunrise on the darkest day
[00:23.313]Got me feelin' some kind of way
[00:26.065]Make me wanna savor every moment slowly, slowly
[00:30.489]You fit me, tailor-made love, how you put it on
[00:33.745]Got the only key, know how to turn it on
[00:36.489]The way you nibble on my ear, the only words I wanna hear
[00:39.450]Baby take it slow so we can last long
[00:41.241]Oh, tú, tú eres el imn y yo soy el metal
[00:44.705]Me voy acercando y voy armando el plan
[00:47.456]Sólo con pensarlo se acelera el pulso
[00:50.673]Oh, yeah
[00:52.225]Ya, ya me está gustando más de lo normal
[00:55.601]Todos mis sentidos van pidiendo más
[00:58.185]Esto hay que tomarlo sin ningún apuro
[01:01.827]Despacito
[01:04.225]Quiero respirar tu cuello despacito
[01:06.849]Deja que te diga cosas al oído
[01:09.521]Para que te acuerdes si no estás conmigo
[01:12.996]Despacito
[01:14.993]Quiero desnudarte a besos despacito
[01:17.625]Firmo en las paredes de tu laberinto
[01:20.369]Y hacer de tu cuerpo todo un manuscrito
[01:22.929](Sube, sube, sube, sube, sube)
[01:25.161]Quiero ver bailar tu pelo
[01:26.832]Quiero ser tu ritmo
[01:28.961]Que le enseñes a mi boca
[01:31.564]Tus lugares favoritos
[01:33.929](Favorito, favorito, baby)
[01:35.818]Déjame sobrepasar tus zonas de peligro
[01:39.681]Hasta provocar tus gritos
[01:42.331]Y que olvides tu apellido
[01:45.138]Si te pido un beso, ven, dámelo
[01:47.233]Yo sé que estás pensándolo
[01:48.705]Llevo tiempo intentándolo
[01:49.946]Mami, esto es dando y dándolo
[01:51.361]Sabes que tu corazón conmigo te hace bang-bang
[01:53.880]Sabes que esa beba está buscando de mi bang-bang
[01:56.713]Ven, prueba de mi boca para ver cómo te sabe
[01:59.377]Quiero, quiero, quiero ver cuánto amor a ti te cabe
[02:02.088]Yo no tengo prisa, yo me quiero dar el viaje
[02:04.808]Empecemos lento, después salvaje
[02:07.506]Pasito a pasito, suave suavecito
[02:10.250]Nos vamos pegando, poquito a poquito
[02:12.848]Cuando tú me besas con esa destreza
[02:15.553]Veo que eres malicia con delicadeza
[02:18.361]Pasito a pasito, suave suavecito
[02:20.993]Nos vamos pegando, poquito a poquito
[02:23.651]Y es que esa belleza es un rompecabezas
[02:26.299]Pero pa' montarlo aquí tengo la pieza
[02:29.129]¡Oye!
[02:30.089]Despacito
[02:31.904]Quiero respirar tu cuello despacito
[02:34.465]Deja que te diga cosas al oído
[02:37.080]Para que te acuerdes si no estás conmigo
[02:40.487]Despacito
[02:42.635]Quiero desnudarte a besos despacito
[02:45.177]Firmo en las paredes de tu laberinto
[02:47.976]Y hacer de tu cuerpo todo un manuscrito
[02:50.578](Sube, sube, sube, sube, sube)
[02:52.752]Quiero ver bailar tu pelo
[02:54.466]Quiero ser tu ritmo
[02:56.595]Que le enseñes a mi boca
[02:59.159]Tus lugares favoritos
[03:01.616](Favorito, favorito, baby)
[03:03.355]Déjame sobrepasar tus zonas de peligro
[03:07.249]Hasta provocar tus gritos
[03:10.034]Y que olvides tu apellido
[03:12.721]Despacito
[03:15.248]This is how we do it down in Puerto Rico
[03:17.731]I just wanna hear you screaming, "¡Ay, Bendito!"
[03:20.449]I can move foreverm se quede contigo
[03:23.552]¡Bailalo!
[03:24.418]Pasito a pasito, suave suavecito
[03:27.048]Nos vamos pegando, poquito a poquito
[03:29.715]Que le enseñes a mi boca
[03:31.667]Tus lugares favoritos
[03:34.016](Favorito, favorito, baby)
[03:35.768]Pasito a pasito, suave suavecito
[03:37.816]Nos vamos pegando, poquito a poquito
[03:40.353]Hasta provocar tus gritos (Fonsi)
[03:42.938]Y que olvides tu apellido (D.Y.)
[03:45:00]Despacito

name: 远走高飞
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : 金志文
[00:00.343] 作词 : 王耀光
[00:01.30]编曲：金志文
[00:02.74]制作监制：赵英俊
[00:03.03]制作统筹：刘金剑/刘昊昱
[00:03.48]出品人：周浩
[00:03.70]吉他：金志文
[00:05.04]贝斯：王佳林
[00:06.33]鼓：祁大为
[00:07.11]合音编写：金志文
[00:08.31]合音：金志文
[00:09.30]人声录音工程师：金志文
[00:12.83]混音工程师：李军
[00:14.08]母带处理工程师：李军
[00:15.46]
[00:18.42]我一路看过千山和万水
[00:22.69]我的脚踏遍天南和地北
[00:27.23]日晒或是风吹 我都无所谓
[00:31.76]路边那朵蔷薇 鲜红的纯粹
[00:36.39]关掉了手机管他谁是谁
[00:40.67]不要去理会是是与非非
[00:45.12]天亮走到天黑 从不觉疲惫
[00:49.74]黄昏中的堡垒 多颓废
[00:53.46]如果迎着风就飞
[00:57.58]俯瞰这世界有多美
[01:02.19]让烦恼都灰飞
[01:04.70]别去理会自我藉慰
[01:10.97]如果还有梦就追
[01:15.58]至少不会遗憾后悔
[01:20.23]迎着光勇敢追
[01:22.84]远走高飞 说走就走一回
[01:25.97]
[01:52.68]翻过了山坡又踏过了水
[01:57.10]跟心走别管东南和西北
[02:01.51]前行或是后退 靠直觉发挥
[02:06.24]日落下的余晖 有一点凄美
[02:10.60]拥挤的城市布满了虚伪
[02:15.07]何必去辩解谁错或是对
[02:19.56]就让一切回归 童真的滋味
[02:24.07]那自由的感觉 不会累
[02:27.83]如果迎着风就飞
[02:32.01]俯瞰这世界有多美
[02:36.54]让烦恼都灰飞
[02:39.09]别去理会自我藉慰
[02:45.44]如果还有梦就追
[02:49.95]至少不会遗憾后悔
[02:54.61]迎着光勇敢追
[02:57.09]远走高飞 说走就走一回
[03:00.40]
[03:17.08]如果迎着风就飞
[03:21.44]俯瞰这世界有多美
[03:26.02]让烦恼都灰飞
[03:28.51]别去理会自我藉慰
[03:34.79]如果还有梦就追
[03:39.45]至少不会遗憾后悔
[03:44.05]迎着光勇敢追
[03:46.52]远走高飞 说走就走一回

name: 讲不出再见-Live
special: 歌者恋歌浓情30年演唱会
lyric:
[ti:讲不出再见]
[ar:谭咏麟]
[00:29.981]是对是错也好不必说了
[00:36.540]是怨是爱也好不须揭晓
[00:43.103]何事更重要比两心的需要
[00:49.445]柔情密意怎么可缺少
[00:56.110]是进是退也好有若狂潮

[01:12.295]我梦想都不要

name: 成都
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : 赵雷
[00:01.00] 作词 : 赵雷
[00:16.75]让我掉下眼泪的 不止昨夜的酒
[00:25.91]让我依依不舍的 不止你的温柔
[00:33.91]余路还要走多久 你攥着我的手
[00:41.70]让我感到为难的 是挣扎的自由
[00:52.10]分别总是在九月 回忆是思念的愁
[00:59.63]深秋嫩绿的垂柳 亲吻着我额头
[01:07.53]在那座阴雨的小城里 我从未忘记你
[01:15.41]成都 带不走的 只有你
[01:23.69]和我在成都的街头走一走
[01:31.08]直到所有的灯都熄灭了也不停留
[01:39.69]你会挽着我的衣袖 我会把手揣进裤兜
[01:47.08]走到玉林路的尽头 坐在(走过)小酒馆的门口
[02:30.37]分别总是在九月 回忆是思念的愁
[02:38.10]深秋嫩绿的垂柳 亲吻着我额头
[02:46.13]在那座阴雨的小城里 我从未忘记你
[02:54.02]成都 带不走的 只有你
[03:02.34]和我在成都的街头走一走
[03:10.41]直到所有的灯都熄灭了也不停留
[03:18.34]你会挽着我的衣袖 我会把手揣进裤兜
[03:25.51]走到玉林路的尽头 坐在(走过)小酒馆的门口
[04:35.96][03:35.40]和我在成都的街头走一走
[04:42.76][03:45.39]直到所有的灯都熄灭了也不停留
[03:53.62]和我在成都的街头走一走
[04:01.35]直到所有的灯都熄灭了也不停留
[04:08.95]你会挽着我的衣袖 我会把手揣进裤兜
[04:17.27]走到玉林路的尽头 坐在(走过)小酒馆的门口

name: I'm Yours
lyric:
[00:12.489]Well you done done me and you bet I felt it
[00:16.030]I tried to be chill but you're so hot that I melted
[00:19.400]I fell right through the cracks
[00:21.920]and now I'm trying to get back
[00:24.929]Before the cool done run out
[00:26.960]I'll be giving it my bestest
[00:28.760]Nothing's going to stop me but divine intervention
[00:31.870]I reckon its again my turn to win some or learn some
[00:38.270]But I won't hesitate no more, no more
[00:45.390]It cannot wait I'm yours
[01:03.949]Well open up your mind and see like me
[01:07.530]Open up your plans and damn you're free
[01:10.610]Look into your heart and you'll find love love love love
[01:16.230]Listen to the music of the moment people dance and sing
[01:20.720]We're just one big family
[01:23.520]It's your God-forsaken right to be loved love loved love love
[01:31.820]So I won't hesitate no more no more
[01:39.520]It cannot wait I'm sure
[01:44.630]There's no need to complicate
[01:48.960]Our time is short
[01:52.230]This is our fate I'm yours
[01:57.770]do do do do you but do you do do do
[02:02.000]But do you want to come on
[02:02.870]Scooch on over closer dear
[02:06.240]And i will nibble your ear
[02:22.540]I've been spending way too long checking my tongue in the mirror
[02:26.890]And bending over backwards just to try to see it clearer
[02:30.700]but My breath fogged up the glass
[02:32.759]And so I drew a new face and laughed
[02:36.710]I guess what i'ma saying is there ain't no better reason
[02:39.879]To rid yourself of vanity and just go with the seasons
[02:43.200]It's what we aim to do
[02:45.589]Our name is our virtue
[02:49.290]But I won't hesitate no more no more
[02:56.390]It cannot wait I'm yours
[03:02.670]Open up your mind and see like me (I won't hesitate)
[03:05.829]Open up your plans and damn you're free (No more, no more)
[03:08.980]Look into your heart and you'll find the sky is yours (It cannot wait, I'm sure)
[03:14.519]So please don't, please don't please don't (There's no need to complicate)
[03:17.200]There's no need to complicate (Our time is short)
[03:20.120]Coz our time is short (This is our fate)
[03:22.589]This is this is this is our fate
[03:25.120]I'm yours

name: Million Reasons
lyric:
[00:15.52]You're giving me a million reasons to let you go
[00:19.06]You're giving me a million reasons to quit the show
[00:22.47]You're givin' me a million reasons
[00:24.80]Give me a million reasons
[00:26.71]Givin' me a million reasons
[00:28.69]About a million reasons
[00:30.13]
[00:30.36]If I had a highway, I would run for the hills
[00:33.83]If you could find a dry way, I'd forever be still
[00:37.32]But you're giving me a million reasons
[00:39.51]Give me a million reasons
[00:41.24]Givin' me a million reasons
[00:43.31]About a million reasons
[00:45.02]
[00:45.21]I bow down to pray
[00:49.64]I try to make the worst seem better
[00:52.37]Lord, show me the way
[00:56.77]To cut through all his worn out leather
[01:00.19]I've got a hundred million reasons to walk away
[01:07.06]But baby, I just need one good one to stay
[01:11.92]
[01:14.60]Head stuck in a cycle, I look off and I stare
[01:18.05]It's like that I've stopped breathing, but completely aware
[01:21.60]'Cause you're giving me a million reasons
[01:23.82]Give me a million reasons
[01:25.53]Givin' me a million reasons
[01:27.57]About a million reasons
[01:28.98]
[01:29.35]And if you say something that you might even mean
[01:32.72]It's hard to even fathom which parts I should believe
[01:36.36]'Cause you're giving me a million reasons
[01:38.71]Give me a million reasons
[01:40.37]Givin' me a million reasons
[01:42.36]About a million reasons
[01:43.70]
[01:44.33]I bow down to pray
[01:48.59]I try to make the worst seem better
[01:51.39]Lord, show me the way
[01:55.98]To cut through all his worn out leather

name: 富士山下
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : christopher chak(泽日生)
[00:01.00] 作词 : 林夕
[00:21.980]拦路雨偏似雪花
[00:24.160]饮泣的你冻吗
[00:26.390]这风褛我给你磨到有襟花
[00:30.910]连掉了渍也不怕
[00:33.220]怎么始终牵挂
[00:35.540]苦心选中今天想车你回家
[00:40.090]原谅我不再送花
[00:42.340]伤口应要结疤
[00:44.560]花瓣铺满心里坟场才害怕
[00:49.130]如若你非我不嫁
[00:51.430]彼此终必火化
[00:53.780]一生一世等一天需要代价
[00:58.320]谁都只得那双手
[01:00.650]靠拥抱亦难任你拥有
[01:03.490]要拥有必先懂失去怎接受
[01:07.880]曾沿着雪路浪游
[01:10.370]为何为好事泪流
[01:12.610]谁能凭爱意要富士山私有
[01:17.340]何不把悲哀感觉
[01:19.320]假设是来自你虚构
[01:21.740]试管里找不到它染污眼眸
[01:26.340]前尘硬化像石头
[01:28.590]随缘地抛下便逃走
[01:33.410]
[01:33.950]我绝不罕有
[01:36.050]往街里绕过一周
[01:38.440]我便化乌有
[01:41.710]
[01:42.460]情人节不要说穿
[01:44.910]只敢抚你发端
[01:47.130]这种姿态可会令你更心酸
[01:51.680]留在汽车里取暖
[01:53.980]应该怎么规劝
[01:56.360]怎么可以将手腕忍痛划损
[02:00.840]人活到几岁算短
[02:03.160]失恋只有更短
[02:05.490]归家需要几里路谁能预算
[02:09.920]忘掉我跟你恩怨
[02:12.300]樱花开了几转
[02:14.610]东京之旅一早比一世遥远
[02:19.160]谁都只得那双手
[02:21.510]靠拥抱亦难任你拥有
[02:24.370]要拥有必先懂失去怎接受
[02:28.860]曾沿着雪路浪游
[02:31.170]为何为好事泪流
[02:33.430]谁能凭爱意要富士山私有
[02:37.910]何不把悲哀感觉
[02:40.040]假设是来自你虚构
[02:42.460]试管里找不到它染污眼眸
[02:46.980]前尘硬化像石头
[02:49.300]随缘地抛下便逃走
[02:54.040]我绝不罕有
[02:56.220]往街里绕过一周
[02:58.950]我便化乌有
[03:01.900]
[03:03.100]谁都只得那双手
[03:05.670]靠拥抱亦难任你拥有
[03:08.440]要拥有必先懂失去怎接受
[03:13.250]曾沿着雪路浪游
[03:15.640]为何为好事泪流
[03:17.810]谁能凭爱意要富士山私有
[03:22.600]何不把悲哀感觉
[03:25.070]假设是来自你虚构
[03:27.380]试管里找不到它染污眼眸
[03:32.000]前尘硬化像石头
[03:34.310]随缘地抛下便逃走
[03:39.350]
[03:41.000]我绝不罕有
[03:43.300]往街里绕过一周
[03:46.430]我便化乌有
[03:50.290]
[03:51.850]你还嫌不够
[03:53.790]我把这陈年风褛
[03:56.650]送赠你解咒
